item.title: Deploy Test Apps
item.description: Now that we havwe defined our contraint templates and deployed some contraints, let’s see if they work! Test image repos in prod namespace Earlier we define that all pods in the production namespace must only use images from xxxx repo. Let’s deploy a pod using a different unauthorized repo. Here’s an example: apiVersion: v1 kind: Pod metadata: name: opa namespace: production labels: owner: me.agilebank.demo spec: containers: - name: opa image: openpolicyagent/opa:0.
